column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Coming from New York
column2: we were really excited to try Lou Malnati's Pizzeria and see what the hype was all about. Unfortunately
column3: the pizza came out COLD and was extremely disappointing. After waiting 45 minutes for our table with an additional 20 minutes after we pre-ordered the pizza
column4: the deep dish should have came out smoking. Crossed it off the bucket list
